items.title: Increased 483 Observations for Data Integrity Issues
items.summary: Q4 analysis shows 23% increase in data integrity-related 483 observations. Electronic record keeping and audit trail gaps remain top concerns.
items.suggestedAction: Update messaging to address new regulatory requirements. Consider content piece.

items.title: Quality Leaders Report 40% More Time Spent on Audit Prep
items.summary: Survey of 200 Quality Directors shows significant increase in audit preparation workload. Manual processes cited as primary bottleneck.
items.suggestedAction: Amplify this pain point in CMO messaging. Create supporting case study.

items.title: Veeva Launches Real-Time Compliance Dashboard
items.summary: New feature provides automated compliance status monitoring. Positioned as 'always-on audit readiness'.
items.suggestedAction: Analyze feature overlap. Update competitive battle cards.
